001
002package com.commercetools.api.json;
003
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.time.LocalDate;
006import java.time.LocalTime;
007import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.regex.Pattern;
010
011import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.common.Reference;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.common.TypedMoney;
014import com.commercetools.api.models.product.*;
015import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributeLocalizedEnumValue;
016import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributePlainEnumValue;
017import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeType;
023
024public class AtrributeDeserializer extends JsonDeserializer<AttributeImpl> {
025
026    private static Pattern p = Pattern.compile("^[0-9]");
027    private static Pattern dateTime = Pattern
028            .compile("^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}[.][0-9]{1,6}");
029    private static Pattern date = Pattern.compile("^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}");
030    private static Pattern time = Pattern.compile("^[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}[.][0-9]{1,6}");
031
032    private final boolean deserializeAsDate;
033
034    public AtrributeDeserializer(boolean deserializeAsDateString) {
035        this.deserializeAsDate = !deserializeAsDateString;
036    }
037
038    public AtrributeDeserializer() {
039        this.deserializeAsDate = true;
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public AttributeImpl deserialize(JsonParser p, DeserializationContext ctx) throws IOException {
044
045        JsonNode node = p.readValueAsTree();
046        JsonNode valueNode = node.get("value");
047
048        AttributeBuilder builder = Attribute.builder();
049        builder.name(node.get("name").asText());
050
051        return (AttributeImpl) builder.value(p.getCodec().treeAsTokens(valueNode).readValueAs(typeRef(valueNode)))
052                .build();
053    }
054
055    private TypeReference<?> typeRef(JsonNode valueNode) {
056        JsonNodeType valueNodeType = valueNode.getNodeType();
057        switch (valueNodeType) {
058            case BOOLEAN:
059                return new TypeReference<Boolean>() {
060                };
061            case NUMBER:
062                if (valueNode.isInt() || valueNode.isLong()) {
063                    return new TypeReference<Long>() {
064                    };
065                }
066                return new TypeReference<Double>() {
067                };
068            case STRING:
069                if (deserializeAsDate) {
070                    String val = valueNode.asText();
071                    if (p.matcher(val).find()) {
072                        if (dateTime.matcher(val).find()) {
073                            return new TypeReference<ZonedDateTime>() {
074                            };
075                        }
076                        if (date.matcher(val).matches()) {
077                            return new TypeReference<LocalDate>() {
078                            };
079                        }
080                        if (time.matcher(val).matches()) {
081                            return new TypeReference<LocalTime>() {
082                            };
083                        }
084                    }
085                }
086                return new TypeReference<String>() {
087                };
088            case OBJECT:
089                if (valueNode.has("key")) {
090                    JsonNode label = valueNode.get("label");
091                    if (label.getNodeType() == JsonNodeType.OBJECT) {
092                        return new TypeReference<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue>() {
093                        };
094                    }
095                    return new TypeReference<AttributePlainEnumValue>() {
096                    };
097                }
098                if (valueNode.has("currencyCode")) {
099                    return new TypeReference<TypedMoney>() {
100                    };
101                }
102                if (valueNode.has("typeId")) {
103                    return new TypeReference<Reference>() {
104                    };
105                }
106                if (valueNode.has("value")) {
107                    return new TypeReference<Attribute>() {
108                    };
109                }
110                return new TypeReference<LocalizedString>() {
111                };
112            case ARRAY:
113                JsonNode first = valueNode.get(0);
114                switch (elemType(first)) {
115                    case STRING:
116                        return new TypeReference<List<String>>() {
117                        };
118                    case DATE:
119                        return new TypeReference<List<LocalDate>>() {
120                        };
121                    case DATETIME:
122                        return new TypeReference<List<ZonedDateTime>>() {
123                        };
124                    case TIME:
125                        return new TypeReference<List<LocalTime>>() {
126                        };
127                    case NUMBER:
128                        return new TypeReference<List<Double>>() {
129                        };
130                    case LONG:
131                        return new TypeReference<List<Long>>() {
132                        };
133                    case BOOLEAN:
134                        return new TypeReference<List<Boolean>>() {
135                        };
136                    case ENUM:
137                        return new TypeReference<List<AttributePlainEnumValue>>() {
138                        };
139                    case LOCALIZED_ENUM:
140                        return new TypeReference<List<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue>>() {
141                        };
142                    case LOCALIZED_STRING:
143                        return new TypeReference<List<LocalizedString>>() {
144                        };
145                    case MONEY:
146                        return new TypeReference<List<TypedMoney>>() {
147                        };
148                    case REFERENCE:
149                        return new TypeReference<List<Reference>>() {
150                        };
151                    case NESTED:
152                        return new TypeReference<List<Attribute>>() {
153                        };
154                    case SET_NESTED:
155                        return new TypeReference<List<List<Attribute>>>() {
156                        };
157                    default:
158                        return new TypeReference<List<JsonNode>>() {
159                        };
160                }
161            default:
162                return new TypeReference<JsonNode>() {
163                };
164        }
165    }
166
167    private ElemType elemType(JsonNode valueNode) {
168        if (valueNode == null) {
169            return ElemType.JSON_NODE;
170        }
171        JsonNodeType valueNodeType = valueNode.getNodeType();
172        switch (valueNodeType) {
173            case OBJECT:
174                if (valueNode.has("key")) {
175                    JsonNode label = valueNode.get("label");
176                    if (label.getNodeType() == JsonNodeType.OBJECT) {
177                        return ElemType.LOCALIZED_ENUM;
178                    }
179                    return ElemType.ENUM;
180                }
181                if (valueNode.has("currencyCode")) {
182                    return ElemType.MONEY;
183                }
184                if (valueNode.has("typeId")) {
185                    return ElemType.REFERENCE;
186                }
187                if (valueNode.has("value")) {
188                    return ElemType.NESTED;
189                }
190                return ElemType.LOCALIZED_STRING;
191            case NUMBER:
192                if (valueNode.isInt() || valueNode.isLong()) {
193                    return ElemType.LONG;
194                }
195                return ElemType.NUMBER;
196            case STRING:
197                if (deserializeAsDate) {
198                    String val = valueNode.asText();
199                    if (p.matcher(val).find()) {
200                        if (dateTime.matcher(val).find()) {
201                            return ElemType.DATETIME;
202                        }
203                        if (date.matcher(val).matches()) {
204                            return ElemType.DATE;
205                        }
206                        if (time.matcher(val).matches()) {
207                            return ElemType.TIME;
208                        }
209                    }
210                }
211                return ElemType.STRING;
212            case ARRAY:
213                return ElemType.SET_NESTED;
214            case BOOLEAN:
215                return ElemType.BOOLEAN;
216            default:
217                return ElemType.JSON_NODE;
218        }
219    }
220
221    private enum ElemType {
222        STRING,
223        DATE,
224        DATETIME,
225        TIME,
226        NUMBER,
227        LONG,
228        BOOLEAN,
229        ENUM,
230        LOCALIZED_ENUM,
231        LOCALIZED_STRING,
232        REFERENCE,
233        MONEY,
234        JSON_NODE,
235        NESTED,
236        SET_NESTED
237    }
238}
